revised_title: Causes of the Daily Variation of the Magnetized Needle, Zodiacal Light, Aurora Borealis, and Simplified Method for Measuring Longitudes
tldr: Demonville presents a hypothesis that the Sun, Moon, Jupiter, and Mars perform a daily circular revolution around the Earth, and discusses the causes of the daily variation of the magnetized needle, zodiacal light, and aurora borealis. He also proposes a simplified method for measuring longitudes.
